column1: What does the following code output if the user enters `Alice`?~ Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);~ System.out.print("Enter your name: ");~ String name = scanner.nextLine();~ System.out.println("Hello
column3:
Hello, Alice$,Alice!$,Hello$,Error$,1$,The Scanner reads the user's input and stores it in the `name` variable. The System.out.println command concatenates the text with the variable `name`.
What does the following code output if the user enters `10`?~ Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);~ System.out.print(Enter a number: ");~ int number = scanner.nextInt();~ System.out.println("You entered:" + number);$
column9:
The Scanner reads the user's input as an integer, and System.out.println outputs the text concatenated with the number.
What does the following code output?~ System.out.println(5 + 3);$,1$,8$,9$,5$,2$, The + operator adds the two integers, so the output is 8.
